channel.title: Compile error
channel.description:
hi everyone i need some help i cant seem to compile my server it just says
' javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file press any key to continue....
can any1 help me please

item.title: Compile error

item.description:
@hackeruk wrote:

kk cheers for that guys means alot i found out i forgot to down the newest java lol

Read full topic

item.title: Compile error
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

get jdku4
edit this in compiler

@echo off
COLOR 09
title compiler
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe" *.java
pause

when it says

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note :Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details Press any key to continue . . .
it means it worked

Read full topic

item.title: Compile error
item.dc:creator: @MasterBacus MasterBacus
item.description:
@MasterBacus wrote:

Replace your compiler with this @echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

~Bacus~

Read full topic
